org.apache.lucene.analysis

Class CharFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharStream
        • org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable , Readable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseCharFilter , PersianCharFilter 

           public abstract class
       
        CharFilter
       
       extends
       
        CharStream
    Subclasses of CharFilter can be chained to filter CharStream. They can be used as Reader with additional offset correction. Tokenizer s will automatically use correctOffset(int) if a CharFilter/CharStream subclass is used.
